LIBRA/THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS SRITAMUIC MAJESTY'S GCSVERNMSNT,SECRET.Copy Ho.CABINET.c.p. 350 (25).STAMPING COMMITTEE Off EXPENDITURE.With reference to Cabinet 22(25), Conclusion 2,and to the announcement by the Chancellor of the Exchequer in his Budget statement on April 28th, I925i the Prime Minister has appointed the following Standing Committee:-The Prime Minister (in the Chair)The Lord Privji Seal,The Chancellor of the Exchequer,The Home Secretary,The Secretary of State for India,The President of the Board of Trade,The First Commissioner of Works,Mr .R.B.Howorth) Joint Mr.W.R.Fraser ) Secretariee.to review the Estimates of National -Expenditure with the object of making a substantial reduction of the charges on the taxpayer.(Signed) M. P. A. HAHKEY,Secretary, Cabinet.2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I. 16th July, 192 5.
